messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the International SMS offer.
What is the cost of sending an international SMS?
How much does it cost to send an international SMS?
Sending an international SMS costs Rs. 29.29 plus tax.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the International SMS offer.
What are the terms and conditions for the International SMS offer?
Can you provide details about the terms and conditions for international SMS?
The price for sending an international SMS is exclusive of tax. Taxes will be applied as per regional or predefined rates where applicable.
